entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
